subject: Horse Racing
Cruelty to Animals
organizations: New York State Racing and Wagering Board
lead_paragraph: Ernie Paragallo, a fixture in New York thoroughbred racing, now faces a total of 35 charges relating to not properly feeding or caring for his horses after an April raid at his farm.
snippet: Ernie Paragallo, a fixture in New York thoroughbred racing, now faces a total of 35 charges relating to not properly feeding or caring for his horses after an April raid at his farm.
